summary: Write pytest unit tests for orchestrator module
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for the orchestrator module including workflow creation, agent routing, error handling, and state management. Target 80% code coverage.

summary: Create integration tests for RAG pipeline
description: Develop integration tests for RAG pipeline covering Weaviate and Neo4j integration, context retrieval, and LLM response generation. Include performance benchmarks.

summary: Add E2E tests for ServiceNow incident workflow
description: Create end-to-end tests for ServiceNow integration testing incident creation, updates, comments, queries, and error handling. Use test instance for validation.

summary: Implement performance tests for chat endpoint
description: Create performance tests for /chat/ API endpoint measuring response time under load, concurrent request handling, memory usage, and database pool behavior. Target: handle 100 concurrent requests with p95 < 2s.

summary: Write security tests for API authentication
description: Develop security tests covering JWT token validation, unauthorized access attempts, SQL injection protection, XSS protection, and rate limiting. Ensure OWASP Top 10 coverage.

Implement tests to detect and prevent LLM hallucinations including fact verification, confidence score validation, source attribution, and detection of fabricated information. Target >90% detection rate.

summary: Add regression tests for critical workflows
description: Create regression test suite for critical paths: user authentication, incident creation, AI chat, RAG retrieval, and report generation. Run on every deployment to detect breaking changes.

summary: Implement smoke tests for deployment validation
description: Create smoke test suite for post-deployment validation checking all services, database connections, API endpoints, external integrations, and critical features. Must run in under 2 minutes.
